description: Black eyed beans and eggplant meld together to make a hearty base for this spicy slow cooker chilli.
name: Black Eyed Bean & Eggplant Chilli Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red onion, peeled and chopped
4 cloves garlic, peeled and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan on medium high heat and cook the onion and eggplant for 6-8 minutes until softened and lightly browned. Add the garlic and smoked paprika and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir in the chipotle paste, black beans (including liquid in the can) and chopped tomatoes and tip into the slow cooker.
Cook on high for 2 hours, stirring halfway through.
Serve with fresh coriander on top.
